attr.title: Cryptrio
attr.desc: Match three of the same type of monster to defeat them. Their weird and wobbly shapes mean you'll have to think hard about where to connect each piece, lest you find yourself backed into a corner ...
attr.inst: Purchase the full game, or grab the free demo, at itch.io (https://ci.itch.io/cryptrio). Download and extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the full game, or grab the free demo, at [itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/cryptrio). Download and extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
